name: Virtua Cop 3
overview:
Virtua Cop 3 is a light gun rail shooter and third arcade game in the Virtua Cop series. Set five years after the events from Virtua Cop 2, the crime lords of Virtua city have recovered from their defeat five years ago. It is once again up to you to rid the streets of Virtua city from crime and assume the role of a Virtua Cop.

The game moves the player's character automatically as he has to gun down criminals and bosses. A new standard weapon is introduced: Guardian II as well as a new weapons changing system. The game has three missions that have their own difficulty: simple, normal and hard. Also new is the ES mode a mode in witch time goes slower to give the player an advantage over the enemies. The game can be played solo or with a friend.
